This Could Have Been Messy

We Made it Neat

Robots are complex machines. They're messy and a pain to put together. We've managed to wrap these pieces up into three simple modules.

UpDroid Commander

Quick Complete Control

Everything you need to get your updroid running.

The robotics and computer vision software is preinstalled on the UP1 series. All you need to access it is a supported web browser and a wifi connection.
